name: Blocked
description:
A terrible space cataclysm created a rift in space and time. That anomaly put two different worlds to their knees and converged them together! Two characters stuck in each others worlds try to find the way back to their homelands. They need to cooperate, or they will get BLOCKED.

In this two player coop platformer, each character can move only on one side of the map. They can pull and push blocks on their way and they can also pass them to the other side. Plan ahead, analyze the situation and get out of this labirynth of ruins.

Game includes easy to use  map editor with the ability to load maps made by others.

Your maps are saved in "blocked/blocked_data/maps". If you wish to load someone's else map, put it in that folder.
